environment_overview:
1) The detected devices include three meross Light Strips identified by their unique IDs: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298, 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709, and 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d. These devices are capable of controlling lighting through functionalities such as switching on/off, adjusting brightness levels, and modifying color settings. The inferred locations of these light strips suggest they are distributed throughout the house, contributing to the overall lighting environment.

2) The current states of the light strips indicate varying brightness levels: the first light strip is set to 70%, the second to 48%, and the third to 35%. To execute the command to darken the entire house, the actionable controls involve turning off any light strips that are currently on and adjusting the brightness of all strips to the lowest level. This will ensure a uniform darkening effect across the house.
